name: hotpocket-js-client
description: Javascript client library to interact with HotPocket smart contracts.

scripts.merge-browser: rm -f -r dist ; mkdir -p dist && cp src/bson-browser.js dist/browser.js && cat src/hp-client-lib.js >> dist/browser.js && cp evernode-license.pdf dist/
scripts.build-browser: npm run merge-browser && npm run minify-browser
scripts.build-node: mkdir -p dist && cp src/hp-client-lib.js dist/index.js && cp npm-readme.md dist/README.md && ./clean-pkg.sh && cp evernode-license.pdf dist/
scripts.publish: npm run build-browser && npm run build-node && npm publish ./dist --tag beta
